Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, west of the Melbourne Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Melbourne Arena is a small entertainment facility where common people can go and fight the dregs of society. Most often, thieves and assassins are thrown to the masses where they are trampled, stomped, stoned and otherwise mutilated to a pulp until they're dead, and then stompted on some more. It is an interesting challenge for less skilled adventurers, but not much of a challenge for more powerful ones.
